body.description: Gently cleanse hair and relieve scalp discomfort with Avalon Organics Scalp Treatment Tea Tree Shampoo. Made with plant-sourced botanicals and essential oils, this certified organic formula balances moisture levels and soothes irritation. Tea tree essential oil, beta-glucan, aloe, quinoa protein and vitamin E work together to condition and seal the hair cuticle for strong, shiny hair and lasting scalp comfort. This EWG VERIFIED shampoo is made with non-GMO ingredients and no parabens, harsh preservatives, synthetic colors or fragrances, or phthalates. It is also vegan and not tested on animals. Includes one 32 oz. bottle of Avalon Organics Scalp Treatment Tea Tree Shampoo. Curated from nature’s pure resources, Avalon Organics NSF organic certified skin care, hair care and bath & body products are deep-rooted in a profound respect for the earth. Combining modern science with the botanical world, we constantly strive to perfect each formula, evolve expertise and deliver innovation. Searching out the beautifying benefits hidden within each plant, Avalon Organics thoughtfully develops formulas to not only nourish the body, but also nourish the mind and the soul.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Deep Rooted Beauty Curated from nature’s pure resources, Avalon Organics NSF organic certified skin care, hair care and bath & body products are deep-rooted in a profound respect for the earth. Combining modern science with the botanical world, we constantly strive to perfect each formula, evolve expertise and deliver innovation. Searching out the beautifying benefits hidden within each plant, Avalon Organics thoughtfully develops formulas to not only nourish the body, but also nourish the mind and the soul.

Driven by a dedication to organic agriculture and formula transparency, all Avalon Organics products are certified to the NSF/ANSI 305 Standard for Personal Care Products Containing Organic Ingredients*. Through this honest, transparent process, the Avalon Organics brand creates products that are safe, effective and conscious of the greater good. *Claim approval was given on April 11, 2011 from QAI with certificate ID C01655324-NSF3HNPC-5.

Humbled by a profound respect for all living beings, Avalon Organics products are vegan and cruelty-free.* The Avalon Organics brand never tests products on animals, and will only source ingredients that the supplier can document are not tested on animals. This commitment to kindness is represented by the leaping bunny logo that appears on product labels. *Cruelty free certified by the CCIC on October 1st, 2008

Avalon Organics Rosemary Shampoo, 32 fl oz Avalon Organics Rosemary Conditioner, 32 fl. oz Avalon Organics Shampoo, Clarifying Lemon, 11 Oz Avalon Organics Conditioner, Clarifying Lemon, 11 Oz More Hair Care Products from Avalon Organics Formulated for thin and limp hair, this shampoo, containing a medley of Rosemary Essential Oil, Quinoa Protein, Calendula, Aloe and Vitamin E, thoroughly cleanses hair while reinforcing volume from root to tip. Formulated for thin and limp hair, this conditioner, containing a medley of Rosemary Essential Oil, Quinoa Protein, Calendula, Aloe and Vitamin E, lightly conditions hair while reinforcing volume from root to tip. Restore natural highlights and shine to dull, lackluster hair with Avalon Organics Clarifying Lemon Shampoo. Restore natural highlights and shine to dull, lackluster hair with Avalon Organics Clarifying Lemon Conditioner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm really liking this brand
reviews.reviewText: I recently decided to make a change in my hair care due to scalp soreness and itchiness. I was wearing my waist-length hair in a dutch or french braid almost every day 8hrs a day at work and my scalp started feeling super itchy at the back and very tender. I decided to cut it to shoulder-length and just wear my hair down every day at work and change my shampoo for the itch. I mean I would just scratch absent-mindedly to the point where it felt raw. I was also worried about tension alopecia. I've been using this shampoo for about 4 months I think and it's really helped. I leave the shampoo in for several minutes while I attend to the rest of my bathing and then wash it out. The itch is nowhere near as bad as before and my scalp doesn't feel raw. That could partly be due to the change of hairstyle but I do think it's helped a good bit. I've noticed if I just avoid scratching AT ALL the itch stays away, but if I scratch a little, it tends to start an itching frenzy. My scalp is still a bit tender if I pull the hair near the back of my scalp, but I had worn the braid style at work for several years and I think the tenderness is just going to take a while to go away. You will still need conditioner because this shampoo is on little on the drying side. My hair also seems to tangle more easily. I alternate with Renpure Biotin/Collagen shampoo (which makes my hair super easy to brush) once or twice a week. I've noticed that my hair has more "poof" after I use this. Like, it's fluffy almost to the point of being a frizzball. I have very, very fine hair and it can be hard to maintain volume, but this shampoo definitely gives me some. It leaves me with that squeaky-clean feel. I think if your scalp issues are not too severe, this shampoo can be beneficial for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the direct, prompt delivery. This shampoo is a fantastic investment for those with dandruff. And it's natural!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this shampoo for about 2-3 years now but I've only purchased it from our local Sprouts (grocery store). I usually buy it only when it's on sale ($15.99). Seeing how it was so much cheaper on amazon, I decided to try it!It is definitely NOT the same shampoo I'm used to using. It is watered down and some sort of gel additive is added to it to make it appear 'thicker'. See my image comparison. The bottle on the left is from Sprouts, while the one on the right is from Amazon. I definitely have to use a lot more of it in order to lather up.Moreover, I have also noticed that it makes my hair much more dry after use, and I've experienced hair loss since I started using it.. a lot more hair collected in the drain than I'm used to seeing. Plus I had a haircut recently so there should be less hair collecting in general.Since I bought this large size bottle, I don't want to return it (like I did when I bought a similar looking bottle from TJ Maxx on sale one time, but returned it then when I saw the gel-like consistency). If my hair loss continues, I may just stop using it.Particularly in this time of the pandemic, I don't want to give up on already scarce supplies :), so I will keep this bottle. But I will certainly not be buying this shampoo from this seller again. I hope my honest review was helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Leaves the hair squeaky clean and helps with slightly dry tickly scalp. Decent price for size that lasts longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as I had an itchy scalp after being ill. it was perfect for the job. No more itchy scalp.

El Shampoo es excelente. Tengo problemas de comezón y acné en el cuero cabelludo. Si bien el acné no lo quitó (porque es hormonal) lo disminuyó muchísimo y la comezón bajó un 90%. La consistencia es más líquida que un shampoo normal pero funciona igual de bien. El olor es delicioso, a menta-eucalipto. Si bien es un poco caro, para cuando tienes un problema, vale la pena, además que viene mucho producto.
My hair feels so soft and it looks shinny, like it very much! Also, my scalp doesn't feel itchy anymore.
one hell of a huge bottle...still using it...

reviews.reviewTitle: But this shampoo is better than Avalon thickening
reviews.reviewText: overpriced in India. But this shampoo is better than Avalon thickening shampoo
